plot: A passionate, yet desperate man fulfills his dream in a forbidden encounter with a young girl who herself was forced to grow up too quickly.
title: Through the Needle
plot_es: A passionate, yet desperate man fulfills his dream in a forbidden encounter with a young girl who herself was forced to grow up too quickly.
plot_en: A passionate, yet desperate man fulfills his dream in a forbidden encounter with a young girl who herself was forced to grow up too quickly.
